message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000.  It's a valuable item, and I'm confident it'll be worth every penny to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $800,000?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $800,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $850,000. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

I understand that the product has value, but $850,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $750,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
